alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Comanche; Grady; McClain; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:40AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Comanche, Grady, southern Caddo, northwestern Stephens, south central Canadian and west central McClain Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 739 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Union City to 7 miles northwest of Boone. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Anadarko, Tuttle, Elgin, Minco, Apache, Rush Springs, Fletcher, Cyril, Sterling, Fort Cobb, Alex, Verden, Cement, Amber, Bridge Creek, Gracemont, and Pocasset. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 55 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Canadian; Comanche; Grady; McClain; Stephens
